bibl.title: Letter from John Hay to the Secretary of War, May 31, 1901

div1.p: On behalf of the Department of State, Hay requests two copies of Sternberg's circular on yellow fever for the Portuguese Minister.

div1.head: Letter from John Hay to the Secretary of War, May 31, 1901
div1.opener:
7
L/T
DEPARTMENT OF STATE,
WASHINGTON.
May 31, 1901.
The Honorable
The Secretary of War.
Sir:
div1.p:
The Portuguese Minister at this capital has re-
quested two copies of Surgeon General Sternberg's recent
circular dealing with yellow fever.

This Department would be glad to receive them if
possible.
I have the honor to be, Sir,
